name: Krokorok

evolution.description: Krokorok can evolve into Krookodile at level 15 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Desert Croc Pokémon. The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon may immediately take another action.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: After suffering a critical hit, this Pokémon doubles the damage dice for a single move it activates on the following turn.
